description.translate: Who said a magician couldn't use his muscles.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§9Faux mage\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Qui à dit qu'un mage ne savait\"}","{\"text\":\"§7pas se servir de ses muscles.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Who said a magician\"}","{\"text\":\"§7couldn't use his muscles.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7DAR§a3 §7HAS§c-2 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
